short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Defend yourself against the YouTube algorithm.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Ever get stuck browsing YouTube for hours? Ever end up on that cat video only to wonder how the heck you got there? Finding yourself in the dark side of YouTube? We have a solution for you. Protect yourself from the YouTube algorithm by blocking suggested videos on the home page, recommended videos and even the comments section so that you can go to YouTube for what you are looking for instead of going down the YouTube rabbit hole.
